item.title: FBI fugitive found hiding in Wales can be extradited to USA
item.description: Daniel Andreas San Diego was on the run from the FBI for 21 years and was found in a cottage in north Wales in 2024.

item.title: Russian general shot several times in Moscow
item.description: Lt Gen Vladimir Alexeyev is a senior figure in the main directorate of Russia's military general staff.

item.title: US and Iran hold talks as fears of direct conflict continue
item.description: The US has built up its military presence in the Middle East in response to Iran's violent crackdown on protests.

item.title: Pandora to switch from silver to platinum over price surge
item.description: The jeweller says it wants to reduce its exposure after the cost of the precious metal has risen.

item.title: More than 30 killed in blast at Pakistan mosque, officials say
item.description: The cause of the explosion was not immediately clear, however reports have suggested it was carried out by a suicide bomber.
